title: SBI may bank on infra bonds to raise Rs 10,000 crore next week
description: State Bank of India is expected to enter the debt market next week to raise up to Rs 10,000 crore via infrastructure bonds, with Bank of India likely to follow a week later to raise Rs 5,000 crore. These bonds help reduce lenders' overall funding costs as they are exempt from CRR and SLR
